title.narrative: Water is Life - Wells & Water Storage

description.narrative:
This project will ensure a reliable source of clean water year round in these locations, which will be maintained and successfully used through community engagement, development of Water Management Committees, training around technical usage, governance approach, and hygiene, as well as regular monitoring by the Ministry of Water Resources and the Ministry of Sanitation and Health to ensure sustainability and impact.
Goals: 1) by the installation of 25 bore hole wells, establishing well committee governance and sanitation training in different locations across the country (communities, schools, clinics) 1) by the installation of 25 bore hole wells, establishing well committee governance and sanitation training in different locations across the country (communities, schools, clinics) 2) by enlarging storage capacity at the Hastings gravity water system. The water is from a dam in the mountains. The storage capacity of the tank is too small for the large community and at night the tank fills and overflows, wasting precious water.
